name: slash
description: Slash is a self-hosted bookmarking and link management platform with tags, search, and previews. It aims to unify scattered links into a single, elegant personal start page.
features: Link management: Organizes bookmarks and links in a centralized dashboard.
Tag system: Categorizes links with multiple tags for flexible organization.
Full-text search: Finds links by searching titles, URLs, descriptions, or tags.
Link previews: Displays website thumbnails and metadata for visual identification.
Collections: Groups related links into collections for project or topic organization.
Browser extension: Saves links directly from Chrome or Firefox with one click.
Public sharing: Creates public collections to share curated link lists with others.
Import tools: Migrates bookmarks from browsers or other bookmark managers.
Custom start page: Uses as a personal homepage with quick access to favorite links.
Dark mode: Switches between light and dark themes for comfortable viewing.
API access: Manages links programmatically via REST API.
Mobile responsive: Accesses and manages links from any device.
